title: Reza Pahlavi, Crown Prince of Iran
summary: Reza Pahlavi (Persian: رضا پهلوی‎; born 31 October 1960) is the eldest son of Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, the last Shah of Iran, and his wife Farah Diba. Prior to the Iranian Revolution in 1979, he was the crown prince and the last heir apparent to the throne of the Imperial State of Iran.
